Actions.Name: Rake
Actions.Effects: Hellion can fly to any point on the line after the attack. Foes in the area must save or be blinded.

Actions.Name: Pinions
Actions.Description: Deal 2 damage 4 times to foes in range 4. Each foe in range must be hit at least once before being hit by another pinion.

Actions.Name: Swoop
Actions.Description: Leave the battlefield. Return to the battlefield in a visible free space at start of next turn with stealth.
